Preterit Intransitive.text: 1)aṯi, baləq ʕal u=malk-ano ʻer kam und tauchte plötzlich bei dem König aufʼ; 176; 57/19;
2)Aṯmǝl balǝqno bu karmayḏi. Yesterday I visited my vineyard. (İlyas p.c)
U yawmawo balǝqno bu kayiwo d kǝtwa bi qǝstaxana. That day I visited a sick person who was in the hospital. (İlyas p.c)

idioms: 1)auftauchen; appear once in a while, 2)Kfarze: to visit
